H2.text: who played meg in season 1 of family guy. Alyson Hannigan

H3.text: who played meg in season 1 of family guy. Lacey Chabert

A4.text: Kunis was nominated for an Annie Award in the category of Voice Acting in an Animated Television Production in 2007.

A5.text: In 1999, Kunis replaced Lacey Chabert in the role of Meg Griffin on the animated sitcom Family Guy, created by Seth MacFarlane for Fox.
